ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Bullcreek Observatory Ground Magnetic Field Data 0.5s Data.
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Bullcreek Observatory Ground Magnetic Field Data 0.5s Data.
ResourceHeader.Description: Ground Magnetic Field Data data from Bullcreek Observatory at 0.5s time resolution.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mark Moldwin, Institute of Geophysics and Planetary Physics and the Department of Earth and Space Sciences (University of California, Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA 90095-1567) for use of data from the Bullcreek Observatory Magnetometer instrument.

InformationURL.Name: The MEASURE Array Bullcreek Observatory Magnetometer Temporary Home Page.
InformationURL.Description: The Temporary web site for information concerning data from the MEASURE array Bullcreek Observatory magnetometer.

AccessURL.Name: Access URL to MEASURE Array Data from the Bullcreek Observatory Magnetometer Instrument
AccessURL.Description: Universal Resource Locator (URL) for access to the MEASURE Bullcreek Observatory Magnetometer data set (flat ASCII table format) in a repository hosted by the Virtual Magnetospheric Observatory at UCLA.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mark Moldwin, Institute of Geophysics and Planetary Physics and the Department of Earth and Space Sciences (University of California, Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA 90095-1567) for use of data from the Bullcreek Observatory Magnetometer instrument.  If data downloaded from the VMOU Data Repository are used in publication kindly acknowledge the Virtual Magnetospheric Observatory, Institute of Geophysics and Planetary Physics, University of California, Los Angeles for providing access to the data.

TimeSpan.Note: Some data gaps are present in the MEASURE magnetic field time series.

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal Time expressed by using a Year, Month, Day, Hour, Minute, Second format.

Structure.Description: Universal Time expressed using a 6-column year, month, day, hour , minute, second format.
